snippet: Suspected militants set off a roadside bomb in the northern part of the Sinai Peninsula on Monday as a bus full of police conscripts drove by, wounding nine of them, officials said.
abstract: Suspected militants set off a roadside bomb in the northern part of the Sinai Peninsula as a bus full of police conscripts drive by, wounding nine; blast comes amid a counterinsurgency operation by Egypt's military and the police in the volatile desert region.
lead_paragraph: Suspected militants set off a roadside bomb in the northern part of the Sinai Peninsula on Monday as a bus full of police conscripts drove by, wounding nine of them, officials said.

headline.main: Egypt: Roadside Bomb Hits Police Bus
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Roadside Bomb Hits Police Bus
